oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bushman terms for various degrees of relationship. Given by /han=kasso (L VIII.-31. 8788-8790, 32. 8792 and 8793, 8845-8847). Terms for various relationships by marriage. (L VIII.-12. 7067 rev. and 7068 rev., 32. 8794 rev.). Words and sentences concerning relationships and what people call their various relatives, as well as terms for plants and animals. (Some given by !nanni and Tamme.) 1) Date on p.8788: 15 September, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-31.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relationships and other words (words and sentences)
